thread.section_title: Energymakeovers Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Energymakeovers | energymakeovers.com.au
thread.title: John Reid

author: John Reid
title: John Reid
text: Very surprised with the guy that did the installation after phone calls nearly put me off. He knew what he was doing, explained it in a way that made sense to an Electrical Engineer, took care and got on with the job. Office staff need better training and the sales process would be much better. Pleased with the result and recommend the company, if you are lucky to get the right guy .
